'''Pate de Fruit''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Pate de Fruit is obtainable from [[Louis]] in the [[Court of Fontaine: Vasari Passage|Vasari Passage]] of the [[Court of Fontaine]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Pate de Fruit increases the party's critical rate by '''10'''/'''15'''/'''20'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Lyney|Cubic Tricks}}
